title: Steph Curry Is Cementing His Legacy in the NBA Finals. Plus, Game 5 Preview | Real Ones
description:
Logan and Raja get together before Game 5 of the NBA Finals to talk about Steph Curry’s incredible performance in Game 4 and what adjustments the Celtics need to make in Game 5 in order to take control of the series.
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Producer: Sasha Ashall
